As she struggles to adjust to her new life, Fanny falls in love with one of her uncle's children. In this heartwarming tale of love and betrayal, audiences will be spellbound by the captivating performances of the cast, including Academy Award-winning actress Emma Thompson in the title role of Fanny Price.
